Text: I got this with the need for a nokia GSM camera-phone with speakerphone.  size[cs][+2] 3660 had similar features, but that is big in size.  6600 looks and feels nice.  This one is full of features(has bluetooth).  LCD[+3] Especially the LCD is big and the camera quality is among the very best around.  I have set up it's PDA features with avantgo.com where you can download info from sites like weather,mapquest maps/directions into it, which is great.  Using supplied s/w, you can transfer all addresses from a different nokia phone into it.  Goes ~3 days after a charge.
